text: The Sullenberger Aviation Museum formerly Carolinas Aviation Museum is a museum located in Charlotte, North Carolina. It holds some of the famous planes that flew. The most famous one was US Airways Flight 1549, AKA the Miracle on the Hudson River. == History == In 1991, Floyd and Lois P. Wilson founded the Carolinas Aviation Museum. In 2010, The state of New York gave the museum the Plane that was Flight 1549. Category:Museums in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in North Carolina Category:Charlotte, North Carolina
title: Sullenberger Aviation Museum
